New Records: Cleveland Cavaliers improved to a franchise-best 10-0 record.
Key Match Events: Jonathan Kuminga scored 21 points off the bench.
Brandin Podziemski added 14 points off the bench.
The Warriors trailed by 41 points at halftime.
Post-Match Reflections: Steve Kerr stated, 'We gotta respond. We need to practice tomorrow. We gotta execute better. We had 13 turnovers in the first half. We were completely disorganized. That’s where I feel like we need the most work.'
